body.name: Cusinart Block Knife Set, 12pc Cutlery Knife Set with Steel Blades for Precise Cutting, Lightweight, Stainless Steel, Durable & Dishwasher Safe, C77SSW-12P
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 35 mins
Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 35 mins
features: Comprehensive Set: This knife set includes a variety of essential knives for all your cooking needs, including a Chef knife, Slicing knife, Santoku knife, Utility knife, Paring knife, Steak knives (4), Sharpening steel, Household shears, and a sleek Black block for convenient storage.

Superior High-Carbon Stainless Steel Blades: Experience exceptional precision and accuracy with the superior high-carbon stainless steel blades included in this set. These blades are designed to deliver optimal performance and lasting sharpness.

Precision-Tapered Ground Blades: The knives feature precision-tapered ground blades that gradually narrow to an extremely sharp, fine edge. This design ensures effortless cutting and slicing, enhancing your overall culinary experience.

Modern Looking Black Block: The set comes with a modern-looking Black block that adds a touch of elegance to your kitchen countertop. It not only provides safe storage for your knives but also enhances the visual appeal of your kitchen space.

Lifetime Warranty: Enjoy peace of mind with the included lifetime warranty. The knives in this set are backed by a lifetime warranty, ensuring that they are free of defects in material and workmanship. This warranty provides you with confidence in the quality and durability of your purchase.
body.description: Let the Cuisirt Classic ColorPro Collection inspire your inner chef with premium cutlery crafted from durable, high-carbon stainless steel. Precision blades that taper to an ultra-sharp, fine edge ensure superior performance, so every cooking task can be completed with ease. Sleek white handles, custom contoured for ergonomic comfort, make each knife effortless to control and eble everyone, from kitchen novice to the seasoned chef, to create mealtime masterpieces.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp and Truly Dishwasher Safe
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this knife set and am thoroughly impressed with its quality. The blades are incredibly sharp, making food preparation a breeze, and they've remained rust-free and look as good as new even after several cycles in the dishwasher. It's rare to find a set that delivers on both performance and ease of maintenance; this one exceeds expectations!

I am thrilled with the quality and performance of this set. It has exceeded my expectations in every way, making it a fantastic addition to my kitchen.First and foremost, the knives in this set are incredibly sharp and offer exceptional cutting precision. Whether I'm slicing through meats, chopping vegetables, or even delicate tasks like mincing herbs, these knives effortlessly glide through ingredients with minimal effort. The blades maintain their sharpness over time, reducing the need for frequent sharpening.The variety of knives included in the set is impressive and covers all my culinary needs. From a chef's knife for versatile use to a bread knife for slicing through crusty loaves, each knife is designed for a specific purpose and performs flawlessly. The set also includes steak knives, which are perfect for dining and entertaining guests.The handles of these knives are ergonomically designed, providing a comfortable and secure grip. They have a good weight to them, striking a balance between being substantial enough for stability and maneuverability. Even during extended use, I have not experienced any discomfort or fatigue in my hand.In terms of aesthetics, the white color of the knife set adds a touch of elegance to my kitchen. The knives are sleek, modern, and easy to clean. The included knife block not only keeps the knives organized and within reach but also adds a stylish element to my countertop.I appreciate the durability of these knives as well. The stainless steel blades and solid construction give me confidence in their long-term performance. Additionally, the knife block provides proper storage and protection for the blades, ensuring they remain in excellent condition for years to come.Overall, the Cuisinart C77SSW-12P Color Pro Collection 12 Piece Knife Block Set in White is a top-notch product that I highly recommend. The outstanding sharpness, versatile selection of knives, ergonomic handles, sleek design, and durability make it a must-have for any kitchen. Whether you're a professional chef or a home cook, this knife set will elevate your culinary experience and make food preparation a joy.
